Title: A Detective Story
Writer: Ellen Moore (additional dialogue), Shin'ichirô Watanabe, Manjirô Ôshio (story)
Actors: James Arnold Taylor, Carrie-Anne Moss, Terrence 'T.C.' Carson, Matt McKenzie
Plot: A private detective is hired to track down the computer hacker known as Trinity. But as he gets close his goal, reality takes a weird turn for him.
